nodes.text: Paladin was a male individual who led the eco-terrorist group the Army of Life during the waning years of the Galactic Republic. He preached that individual should leave the ecology of planets that they visited as wild and random as possible, and he also encouraged people to carry out acts of terrorisms. However, he never spoke to live audiences and instead, his speeches were distributed over the HoloNet by his followers. Paladin's followers did not know for certain what species he was, but they assumed that he was a Human.
